rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
入学准备程度可预测未来的缺勤情况利兹大学领导的一项新研究显示，老师认为没有“做好上学准备”的孩子在教育过程中的某个阶段持续缺勤的可能性是其他孩子的两倍多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/School-readiness-predicts-future-absenteeism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/School-readiness-predicts-future-absenteeism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d7859e8-79c5-4317-ae49-3a8d33cf0b5b Wed, 26 Jun 2024 23:55:56 -0400 School readiness predicts future absenteeism
研究发现戒酒和康复可降低癌症风险法国波尔多大学医院成瘾与心理健康中心 (CAMH) 和世界卫生组织 (WHO) 进行的一项新研究发现，接受康复或保持戒酒的酒精依赖者患酒精的风险显着降低相关癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Study-finds-lower-cancer-risk-with-alcohol-abstinence-and-rehabilitation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Study-finds-lower-cancer-risk-with-alcohol-abstinence-and-rehabilitation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb99798d-4964-4e18-8d52-811db390050a Wed, 26 Jun 2024 23:42:22 -0400 Study finds lower cancer risk with alcohol abstinence and rehabilitation
专家呼吁为性高潮后疾病综合症提供更好的信息和治疗方法《国际阳痿研究杂志》上的一项研究表明，性医学专家发现目前有关性高潮后疾病综合症（POIS）的信息不足，经常将患者转介接受心理治疗或开抗组胺药，但症状改善有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Experts-call-for-better-information-and-treatments-for-post-orgasmic-illness-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Experts-call-for-better-information-and-treatments-for-post-orgasmic-illness-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=913397e1-fb0e-4b86-aea8-e4251b0b7f32 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 23:39:00 -0400 Experts call for better information and treatments for post-orgasmic illness syndrome
伦敦大学学院的研究人员强调心血管健康在痴呆风险中日益重要的作用伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，与吸烟和教育程度较低等因素相比，与心血管健康相关的痴呆症危险因素可能随着时间的推移而增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/UCL-researchers-highlight-the-forming-role-of-cardioangiography-health-in-dementia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/UCL-researchers-highlight-the-forming-role-of-cardioangiography-health-in-dementia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8f5e1ec-77ea-4953-bc51-4dda90a880df Wed, 26 Jun 2024 23:16:54 -0400 UCL researchers highlight the growing role of cardiovascular health in dementia risk
菜籽二酰甘油油可以通过增强脂质代谢来对抗肥胖《Nutrients》中的一项研究探讨了菜籽二酰甘油油 (RDG) 如何影响肥胖小鼠的脂肪积累和代谢，显示出在降低肥胖相关指标和改善脂质代谢方面的显着益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Rapeseed-diacylglycerol-oil-may-combat-obesity-by-enhancing-lipid-metabolism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Rapeseed-diacylglycerol-oil-may-combat-obesity-by-enhancing-lipid-metabolism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15e7d636-10c5-4137-9622-ed5c810f0afa Wed, 26 Jun 2024 23:16:00 -0400 Rapeseed diacylglycerol oil may combat obesity by enhancing lipid metabolism
肠道中与食物成瘾相关的特定细菌一个国际研究小组发现了肠道中的特定细菌，这些细菌与小鼠和人类对食物成瘾有关，从而导致肥胖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Specific-bacteria-in-the-gut-linked-with-food-addiction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Specific-bacteria-in-the-gut-linked-with-food-addiction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f17fab7-5698-4e07-969e-a44111ff1903 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 23:13:13 -0400 Specific bacteria in the gut associated with food addiction
持续参与体育运动与改善成年人的心理健康有关一项新的研究发现，在青少年时期持续参加有组织的体育运动的成年人比那些从未参加过体育运动或退出的人更少出现焦虑和抑郁症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Continously-sports-participation-linked-to-better-mental-health-in-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Continously-sports-participation-linked-to-better-mental-health-in-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53437ba4-acff-49d7-838c-cb8​​0a5dabdf0 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 23:07:52 -0400 Continuous sports participation linked to better mental health in adults
基于 CRISPR 的基因技术消灭疟疾蚊子的效率超过 99%加州大学科学家开发出一种精确引导的昆虫不育技术，消灭冈比亚按蚊，实现了超过99.5%的雄性不育性和99.9%的雌性致死率，有效抑制了疟疾传播。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/CRISPR-based-genic-technique-eradicates-malaria-mosquitoes-with-over-9925-efficiency.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/CRISPR-based-genic-technique-eradicates-malaria-mosquitoes-with-over-9925-efficiency.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b07dc63-95f6-4130-b97f-ee39d42e91ab Wed, 26 Jun 2024 23:05:00 -0400 CRISPR-based genetic technique eradicates malaria mosquitoes with over 99% efficiency
太极拳和认知行为疗法可以减少乳腺癌幸存者的失眠和炎症由加州大学洛杉矶分校健康中心领导的新研究证实，太极拳和认知行为疗法都可以减少乳腺癌幸存者的失眠，而且还可以通过减少炎症和增强抗病毒防御来提供额外的健康益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Tai-Chi-and-cognitive-behavioral-therapy-can-reduce-insomnia-inflammation-in-breast-cancer-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Tai-Chi-and-cognitive-behavioral-therapy-can-reduce-insomnia-inflammation-in-breast-cancer-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3076ddce-7d1e-43cf-a2c2-d1084e996442 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 23:03:21 -0400 Tai Chi and cognitive behavioral therapy can reduce insomnia, inflammation in breast cancer survivors
杜克大学的研究人员发现了恢复老化肝脏的药物虽然肝脏是人体最具弹性的器官之一，但它仍然容易受到压力和衰老的破坏，导致疾病、严重疤痕和衰竭。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Duke-researchers-discover-drug-to-restore-ged-livers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Duke-researchers-discover-drug-to-restore-ged-livers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ee1cd22-e73b-4f5b-9184-a6f6695762b3 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 22:56:41 -0400 Duke researchers discover drug to restore aged livers
